name: Insufficient Isolation of Symbolic Constant Definitions
description:
The source code uses symbolic constants, but it does not
					sufficiently place the definitions of these constants into a more centralized or
					isolated location.
extended_description: <xhtml:p>This issue makes it more difficult to maintain the software, which indirectly affects security by making it more difficult or time-consuming to find and/or fix vulnerabilities.  It also might make it easier to introduce vulnerabilities.</xhtml:p>

author: Robert A. Martin
Lawrence H. Shafer
references.title: Providing a Framework for Effective Software Quality Assessment
